config_definition.entry: Toggle to turn on accelerated decomposition spinup for CN biogeochemistry model
Toggle to turn on calculation of SNow and Ice Aerosol Radiation model (SNICAR) radiative forcing (SNICAR_FRC .true.is EXPERIMENTAL NOT SUPPORTED!)

CLM Biogeochemistry mode none = Satellite Phenology (SP) cn = Carbon Nitrogen model cndv = Carbon Nitrogen with Dynamic Global Vegetation Model casa = CASA' model based on Carnegie-Ames-Stanford Approach Carbon-only cycle model (CASA is EXPERIMENTAL NOT SUPPORTED!)
Glacier model number of elevation classes (Setting glc_nec to anything other than 0 or 10 is EXPERIMENTAL NOT SUPPORTED!)
Root directory of CLM source distribution (directory above configure).
Component framework interface to use (Model Coupling Toolkit, or Earth System Modeling Framework or variable set at build-time)
User source directories to prepend to the filepath. Multiple directories are specified as a comma separated list with no embedded white space. Normally this is SourceMods/src.clm in your case.
User specified CPP defines to append to Makefile defaults. Note: It's recommended to use configure options to set standard CPP values rather than defining them here.
User specified C compiler overrides Makefile default (Linux and Darwin only). ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard ccsm scripts
User specified C compiler options to append to Makefile defaults. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard ccsm scripts
User specified Fortran compiler overrides Makefile default. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard ccsm scripts
Switch to enable debugging options for Fortran compiler: 0=off, 1=on. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard ccsm scripts
Toggle to turn on dust module
Toggle to turn on C13 isotopes as part of the CN biogeochemistry model (C13 is EXPERIMENTAL NOT SUPPORTED!)
CCSM build machine name and compiler (set by create_newcase)
Toggle to turn on exit spinup mode on for CN biogeochemistry after ad_spinup was run.
User specified Fortran compiler flags to append to Makefile defaults. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard ccsm scripts
User specified Fortran optimization flags to override Makefile defaults. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard ccsm scripts
User specified linker. Overrides the Makefile default $(FC). ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard ccsm scripts
User specified load options to append to Makefile defaults. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard ccsm scripts
Switch to enable or disable building SPMD version of CLM: 0=off, 1=on. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard ccsm scripts
Switch to enable or disable building SMP version (Open-MP) of CLM: 0=off, 1=on. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard ccsm scripts
Directory containing NetCDF include files. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard ccsm scripts
Directory containing NetCDF library. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard ccsm scripts
Directory containing NetCDF module files. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard ccsm scripts
Maximum number of plant function types (PFT) per gridcell (numpft+1 means use all available) (Setting maxpft to anything other than numpft+1 is EXPERIMENTAL NOT SUPPORTED!)
Directory containing MPI include files. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard ccsm scripts
Directory containing MPI library. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard ccsm scripts
Name of MPI library. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard ccsm scripts
CLM coupling mode, ext_ccsm_seq is for use with cpl7 scripts, ccsm_seq is ONLY for CLM stand-alone testing scripts.
Toggle to build using CCSM makefiles or not. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard ccsm scripts
Toggle to turn on perturbation error growth test
Toggle to turn on prognostic sea salt
Toggle to turn on river transport module, to run global river routing model to ocean
Toggle to make wild-fires inactive for biogeochemistry=CN mode
OS for which CLM is being built. The value is the name returned by the "uname -s" command on the target platform. This parameter is to allow cross-compilation (linux,aix,darwin,bgp etc.).

Toggle to turn on coupling of Volatile Organic Compounds module to atmosphere model. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard ccsm scripts. This is turned on with the CCSM_VOC env_conf.xml in the standard ccsm scripts.
